title: Dictionary Phonebook
description: Create a program that simulates a phonebook using a dictionary. The program should allow users to add, remove, and search for contacts. When adding a contact, the program should prompt for the name and phone number. When removing a contact, the program should prompt for the name of the contact to remove. When searching for a contact, the program should prompt for the name and display the corresponding phone number if found.
sample_input:
add John 1234567890
remove Jane
search John
sample_output:
Contact added: John 1234567890
Contact removed: Jane
John: 1234567890
